summary: This document discusses the views of Colonel Ton That Xung regarding the possibility of a coup d'etat in South Vietnam. He indicates that plans for such action would not be communicated to the Americans due to the US opposition to unlawful acts.
title: Views... Possible Coup D'Etat
recipient: STATE, ARMY/ACSI, NAVY, AIR, JCS, SECDEF, NSA, NIC, USIA, OCI, ONE, OCR, LORR
